page.title: 12LIFE STYLES -ETTRICK VALLEY>
page.content: People in central Ettrick have learned to be self sufficient. Housewives are excellent bakers and many public functions bear witness to that with home made teas and suppers. Men can turn their hands to most things and many jobs around the farm are done by farmer and farm workers from machinery repairs to dyking and draining. Entertainment is often home made, Winter being the season for home visiting. Pleasures cost little yet are every bit as enjoyable as any professional entertainments. During the Winter months households have to be well stocked and the womenfolk are thrifty and adaptable and well able to cope with difficult weather conditions.
